title: Interpretation of a dream about fishing according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of hunting in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Website Seeing fishing in a dream In this paragraph we talk about seeing fishing in a dream, dreaming of fishing in a dream, interpretation of seeing fishing in a dream, the meaning of fishing in a dream by Ibn Sirin in this paragraph. Seeing someone fishing in a dream means fulfilling and fulfilling desires and achieving the goal and goal in life A fish in a dream is good news for a married woman, a single woman, a man, a child and all individuals. It can mean marriage and pregnancy in the near future, obtaining benefit, showing kindness and living in life. A big fish in a dream. In this paragraph we are talking about a big fish in a dream. Ibn Sirin. A big fish in a dream, this can be a sign that he will get rid of sadness and stress, and his life will turn into joy, happiness and psychological comfort. Also, seeing a small fish can mean happy events and getting rid of the sad news that many women suffer from, in If he sees a big fish, the dreamer may suffer from the fact that sad events may be more than just happy events. Interpretation of a dream about seeing fish. In this paragraph we talk about the interpretation of a dream about seeing a dead fish in a dream. Fishing in a dream for a single woman. A dream about fishing with polluted water. A dream about fishing with salty water in This paragraph. A dead fish in a dream can mean that a person sees a dead fish, because it can indicate a lack of desire to satisfy desires and the ability to satisfy desires, comfort and psychological happiness. In fact, it can cause many problems, so seeing dead fish may be a matter Annoying. Fishing in a dream for a single woman and an unmarried woman who dreams of fishing indicates that she will gain money, kindness, and livelihood, and enjoy psychological comfort, tranquility, and beauty. Good news may mean marriage soon. Seeing fish scales can indicate safety, a feeling of calm, psychological comfort, and happiness, and seeing fishing is auspicious for girls and women, as confirmed by dream scholars and interpreters. Interpretation of dreams about fishing in polluted waters. Seeing fishing in a dream in polluted waters can mean exposure to various sorrows and misfortunes in life. Which a person goes through, and makes him suffer from constant suffering and stress. As for the one who sees that he is fishing in pure and fresh water, it can indicate food, the acquisition of lawful money, and the blessing of money, health, and children. Interpretation of a dream about fishing in salt water. And whoever sees that he is fishing in salt water could be Evidence of his exposure to injustice and psychological problems that affect the viewer and expose him to feelings of anxiety and discomfort in life. Seeing a stick in a dream may be a sign of hearing all the good news, because the fish and the penis are good skins in reality. It can indicate the dreamer’s desire to achieve all the desires that he desires. In achieving it, and he will be able to undermine it in the near future, and this interpretation is according to Ibn Sirin’s vision. Interpretation of a dream about hunting for a single woman. The vision of hunting means obtaining goodness, benefit, and livelihood. And because it is good news for unmarried men.

title: Dream Interpretation to see a legal spell in a dream

preview.html: Explain that dreams of seeing Sharia ruqyah in dreams have many important instructions and indicators in our lives, because Sharia ruqyah is a collection of prophetic books and hadiths, aiming to protect the human soul from all kinds of evil. From abuse and demons, here, according to the great Arab translators and scholars, we understand what is the interpretation of a dream about a legitimate ruqyah dream, which indicates goodness, security, prevention of diseases, repayment of debts, happiness and happiness. Family stability and comfort after exhaustion, and we will learn about it in this article. The vision of the legal ruqyah indicates the end of anxiety and comfort after fatigue, as well as psychological peace and satisfaction of desires. Interpretation of the dream of the legal ruqyah by Ibn Sirin: Seeing the legal ruqyah from Ibn Sirin’s point of view indicates the dreamer’s desire to Money and knowledge. Seeing a legal rukia in a dream is a sign of relief from stress and sadness. Seeing a legal rukia for the elderly in a dream denotes knowledge, wisdom, wisdom in matters of life and immunity against demons. Seeing a legal rukia reading indicates recovery from sickness, illness and disease. A dream of a legal rukia indicates a long life. For the pioneer. Interpretation of a dream to see a legal talisman in a dream is evidence of a desire for psychological comfort. Read also: The meaning of seeing a talisman in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a legal ruqyah for a single woman: Seeing someone as if asking her to read a ruqyah, but she refused in her dream, which indicates that she hears painful news about her, but she It will improve after that. Seeing the legal ruqyah for a girl indicates that she is suffering from stress and tension. As for an unmarried woman, she saw someone reciting the legal ruqyah in her dream and felt psychological comfort that indicates relief after fatigue and psychological peace. If an unmarried girl sees that a young man is reciting the legal ruqyah to her, This indicates his marriage to her or the approaching marriage of the girl. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Balad in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a legal spell for a married woman: Seeing a married woman reading a ruqyah. The husband shows envy and hatred from some people, such as friends or neighbors. Seeing a legal rukiya for a wife indicates anxiety. And tension and fear, but all of this will disappear and their psychological and social conditions will improve. If the married woman is seen reciting the legal ruqyah over the boy, this indicates his safety from envy and jinn and his guidance. Read also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing Surat Yasin in a dream by Ibn Shirin and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of the dream of the legal talisman for the pregnant woman Seeing a pregnant woman reciting the legal ruqyah in a dream indicates the birth of a healthy, healthy child. Seeing the legal ruqyah in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the ease and ease of childbirth. Interpretation of a dream of the legal ruqyah for a man: Seeing the legal ruqyah in a man’s dream indicates that he will acquire wealth and will receive A prestigious job. The legal vision for a man indicates comfort after fatigue, safety and security. Reading the legal rukiya in a dream means that you will get an excellent job, abundant sustenance and abundant kindness. Interpretation of a dream about someone promoting me to bachelors. If she sees

title: Interpretation of seeing the thigh in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of seeing the thigh in a dream by Ibn Sirin It has many different interpretations, each of which has a meaning according to what the dreamer saw in his dream, and some of them declare the disappearance of disputes and the solution of problems, and some of them emphasize caution against financial losses and the accumulation of debts. Or the loss of a loved one, these interpretations are discussed throughout the article. Interpretation of seeing a white thigh in a dream: If a man sees that the whiteness of his thigh in a dream is a sign of his knowledge and wisdom. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream means that she is learning jurisprudence and religion. A married woman’s dream symbolizes her wisdom and good behavior. In managing the affairs of her home and taking care of her family. The white thigh in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that he has learned the principles of religion well, and the vision portends the birth of virtuous offspring. Interpretation of touching the thigh in a dream. Touching another person’s thigh in a dream indicates that the dreamer is checking his situation to know all his news. Punishing someone To expose his thigh in a dream is an indication of blaming the dreamer and warning his relatives. Seeing the thigh falling or being injured in a dream means that the dreamer will travel for work. Seeing the thigh in a merchant’s dream symbolizes his trade that brings him a lot of profits. Interpretation of seeing a knife in the thigh in a dream A knife in the thigh in a dream, and wounding him Deep, a sign that the dreamer is facing a difficult financial crisis. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream means that she will suffer from stress and sadness during this period. The vision warns of the loss or illness of a dear person. Show the person who sees a stab. This indicates in the dream that you are prohibited from traveling or leaving The symbol of the thigh in Al-Osaimi’s dream. Seeing the thigh in a dream expresses the strength and perseverance of the one who sees it. To see yourself cutting your thigh in a dream means immigration and leaving your homeland for work. Exposing the thigh in a married man’s dream means that you are facing family problems. Seeing a strong thigh in a dream indicates relationships. The dreamer’s family life and the strength of his personality. Interpretation of a dream about a thigh injury for a married woman. An injury to the thigh in a married woman’s dream indicates the marital strife she is going through. Cutting the thigh in a dream is a sign of her husband’s journey and death in exile. If a woman sees that her thigh looks like copper in a dream, this is evidence that she Sins have been committed. The exposure of the thigh and the appearance of the thigh in a dream is a sign of difficulties at work that end in the woman’s failure to achieve what she wants. The lower part of the thigh indicates the illness or loss of a loved one, and God knows best. Exposing the thigh in front of the husband in a dream is a sign of happiness and kindness that will soon reign over them. See also: - Interpretations of a dream about seeing hair in a dream in detail. Bleeding in the groin in a dream. The blood that comes out of the groin in a dream for a man indicates a war he is waging or a strong rivalry with his colleagues. See the point outside. Blood from the groin indicates confronting crises. A married woman’s dream symbolizes the coming pregnancy, and God knows best. Interpretation Dreaming of sleeping on the lap of a single person. If he only sees sleeping on a stranger’s lap in a dream, it is a sign that the young man is marrying her. The vision announces the engagement of a free girl. He is a trustworthy young man and she will feel safe with him. An unmarried woman sleeping on her father’s lap in a dream is...

title: Seeing an open grave in a dream

preview.html: If the dreamer opens the grave, it shows his marriage to a stingy woman in life, and the dream shows the bad things that the dreamer sees. Interpretation of seeing an open grave in a dream for one girlIf an unmarried woman sees in a dream that her father opens the grave in a dream. To bury a relative in the dream and she was very afraid. It appears that there are many problems that the dreamer will face and suffer during this period of her life. But with her closeness to Almighty God, she will end all these problems. And the unmarried woman who dreams that she is looking at the grave. He was opening it in front of her without helping her open it in a dream, and she was very sad for him. Here it appears that this single girl, if she is engaged, needs to break off her engagement to this person and that no good will come out of him in her life, and God knows best. And seeing the unmarried girl trying to open the grave in the dream but she was unable, and she was trying to find someone to help her in the dream. It indicates here that this single girl will try in different ways to go down the wrong path and do things that are not good, except that God Almighty will save them. See also: Interpretation of a cemetery in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing an open grave in a dream for a married woman. And seeing a married woman seeing in a dream that her husband is trying to open The grave in a dream is for the burial of one of her relatives. Here it indicates that there are problems that this married woman will see in her married life and in her children, and she will grieve for them greatly. And the married woman who sees in a dream that the grave opened under her feet without looking at what is inside it or participating in opening it in the dream. The meaning indicates that the woman who dreams will face many bad things in her life, which will cause her great disappointment and despair, and God knows best. And if a married woman sees in a dream that the grave is very large in the dream. Its door was opening and closing, and she saw it and tried to close it forever. It explains The great fear that a married woman feels in her life during this time. And she is trying to get rid of all the annoying things that happen to her husband or children in life. Interpretation of seeing an open grave in a dream for a divorced woman: If the divorced woman sees that her ex-husband opened the grave in a dream, and closed it well in the dream So that he does not see anything from it. It indicates that there are great problems and fears that this ex-husband will bring into her life, but she will get rid of them, God willing. And the divorced woman who was able to get rid of opening the grave in a dream, and asked for help from those close to her to close it with her in the dream. And here it appears The meaning is that the divorced woman will fall into a big problem in her life during this time and it will cause her a lot of problems and suffering. Seeing the divorced woman in a dream is that she sees the grave opening next to her without him helping to open it or trying to open it in the dream and he was sad. This indicates that this divorced woman will face a problem. New in her life. A lot of difficult things will happen to her, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about a coffin with a dead person inside it. Interpretation of seeing an open grave in a dream about a man and its meaning. If the dreamer sees in a dream that the grave is opening. And he was very sad because he did this humiliation.

title: Interpretation of a dream about coins in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cutting coins in a dream: In case you want to know the interpretation of a dream about coins in a dream, it is one of the dreams that makes the dreamer feel very anxious, but he wants to know an explanation for that, so he will do so. Find out its interpretation in the following lines, which are the interpretations of some working scholars and not the site managers. They do not interfere in the interpretations, but rather convey the interpretations of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about coins in a dream: Finding coins in a dream can indicate good things that will come to the dreamer during this time. In the case of his personal opinion that he finds gold coins in a dream, this could indicate recovery from diseases and relief of pain. In the case of his personal opinion that he finds gold coins, it may indicate earning a lot of money during this period, and God knows best. Seeing coins could indicate In a dream, to meet needs and be freed from problems, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about cutting a large nail in a dream: If an unmarried girl sees herself cutting her long nails, this may indicate good morals and behavior. A dream about cutting a large nail in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s upcoming happiness in his life during this period. Period. Anyone who sees in a dream that he is cutting his nails may indicate the end of problems and fears in the dreamer’s life. If someone sees himself cutting his nails in a dream, this indicates enjoying good days in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about cutting a golden necklace in a dream can be A piece of gold in a dream indicates the departure of an important person in one’s life during this time. If you dream that you are cutting a golden necklace, this may indicate severing family ties, and God knows best. If you see yourself cutting a golden necklace in a dream, this may indicate some obstacles. Which the dreamer faces in his life during those days. Seeing golden road blocks in a dream may indicate the distance of obstacles that the dreamer may face with his family and relatives during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of cutting pastry in a dream If you see yourself cutting a cake in a dream, it may mean that That you will have a lot of money and a lot of good things. If you see yourself cutting a cake in a dream, this may indicate goodness coming to the dreamer during this period. In the event that one saw that he was cutting a cake in a dream, this may indicate good news that The dreamer will receive it on those days. If you see yourself cutting a cake in a dream, this may indicate money that a large heir will gain, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of cutting a highway in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that he is crossing the road alone, may indicate stability in life to an extent It is significant during those days. Seeing cars blocking roads may indicate positive changes that occur in the dreamer’s life during these days. In the event that someone sees that he is crossing the road of cars, this may indicate positive changes that occurred in his life during those days. It may A person’s dream of blocking a highway is an indication of changes for the better, and God knows best.Interpretation

It may A person’s dream of blocking a highway is an indication of changes for the better, and God knows best.Interpretation

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing roses in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of Ibn Sirin in a dream Ibn Sirin interpreted roses in a dream to symbolize many things, such as being a good son to his family, money from a lawful source, fleeting happiness, or impermanent trade. Whoever sees in his dream that he is cutting down a rose bush, this indicates Anxiety and sadness are approaching, and this is an indication that an enemy of the person in the dream will make a covenant with him and will not fulfill it. He - She. Interpretation of roses in a dream for a man. If she sees a man putting a ring of roses on his head, this is a sign that he will marry and divorce his wife in a short time. Interpretation of roses in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees herself sleeping in her bed with roses next to her, this is evidence of A feeling of joy and happiness. Whoever sees herself watering roses, this is evidence that she will marry someone she loves very much. Interpretation of roses in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees roses in her dream, this means that she lives a decent and happy life with her husband and family. Interpretation of roses in a dream for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman saw herself buying roses in a dream, it means that she will receive happy news, and when she sees a rose in her dream, it means that she will give birth to a female. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of roses in a dream. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing white roses in a dream is as money and red roses as a beautiful woman. As for whoever sees that he smells a yellow rose, this indicates a sick woman, and whoever sees himself harvesting roses, this is evidence of his love among people. Interpretation of a black rose in a dream: Seeing black roses in a dream indicates illness, disappointment, or anxiety about something in the person’s life in the dream. And sometimes death, according to what a person sees in his dream.

title: Interpretation of a dream about hitting my wife in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams that I hit my wife in a dream. Interpretations of dreams contain a large group of interpretations according to the details mentioned by the opinion, which express the situation in which the dream is going. These details help interpreters to always know the correct interpretations of the vision, and many people searched for the interpretation of dreams that I I collided with my wife in a dream, and during our article we will provide you with information about what is the interpretation of the dream that I collided with my wife in the dream and the interpretation of the dream that I hit my wife, and what is the interpretation of the dream that my husband hits me, and what does it mean for a lover who hits his lover in a dream. What is the interpretation of the dream of hitting my wife in a dream Interpretation of a dream about beating my wife in a dream according to the state of beating. If the beating in the dream was severe, this indicates great affection and love between them and the happy life that the husband and wife live. The interpretation of this vision indicates that each spouse is satisfied with the other in their lives, especially in the intimate relationship between them. The interpretation of this vision also indicates the appearance of pregnancy in the wife, especially in the case when the wife has been gone for a long time and has not become pregnant. Interpretation of a dream about hitting my wife. Interpretation of the reason for hitting My Wife has a range of explanations. This vision indicates the benefits and many good things that the husband offers to his wife. Or the interpretation of this dream is to help the wife make an important decision regarding their marital life, so the interpretation depends on the details that come in the dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about my husband beating me? Seeing a husband severely beating his wife indicates great love between the husband and his wife. This indicates the great extent of love and understanding between them in their married life and the absence of problems between them in all areas and relationships. What does it mean for a lover who hits his girlfriend in a dream? If a lover hits his girlfriend in a dream, this indicates the outbreak of major disputes between them in the coming period and that these disputes will end without Spoiling the relationship between them. The interpretation of this dream largely depends on the person’s condition. With God Almighty and at the time the dream occurs, no action is taken. The correct interpretations: If the dream was of someone who has no connection to the Islamic religion or in forbidden relationships between lovers, then how can this be from God Almighty to those who disobey Him? It is mentioned that the interpretation of dreams has a set of factors that scholars rely on in interpreting dreams.. The dream.

title: Interpretation of leprosy in a dream

preview.html: Here is the interpretation of leprosy in a dream, which is considered one of the reptiles that many people fear and dread because of its effect on the soul. This is what causes fear and panic when seen, and we also find that seeing insects or animals in a dream is what puts the viewer in a state of psychological imbalance or comfort during sleep and after waking up, so some seek to interpret the meaning. Of leprosy in a dream to determine its meanings. Let us learn about the meanings of this dream through this article presented to you by an encyclopedia that monitors for you the efforts of scholars to decode the vision of a dream about a gecko. Let us go. Interpretation of leprosy in a dream. In the following lines, we take a look at the interpretations provided by an interpreter scholar. Dreams, Ibn Sirin, about seeing a gecko in a dream. The scholar Ibn Sirin interprets the dream of a fortuneteller in a dream that a gecko had bitten him. This symbolizes that someone close to him is trying to harm him, or creates problems and obstacles in some way. Ibn Sirin also believes that seeing a leper in a dream symbolizes deviation from truth and goodness, and it also shows hatred and a tendency toward bad deeds and sayings. Seeing killing a leper in a dream means victory On evil and getting rid of bad things in the dreamer’s life. But if the dreamer sees in a dream that leprosy is blowing near his body, this symbolizes that the dreamer is getting sick, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing lepers near money is interpreted as a huge loss to the viewer of his money. If One saw leprosy on the walls in a dream, this means that a relative curses him in his absence or reminds him of bad things. Interpretation of a dream about leprosy in a dream for a married womanScientists interpret the dream of a married woman who kills a leper in her home, as meaning that she will eliminate many of the problems she faces, as well as getting rid of Of the crises and fears that stand in her way. It should be noted that seeing people suffering from leprosy in a dream can mean paying off debts. The dream of a married woman suffering from leprosy in a dream indicates family differences that need correction and intervention to resolve them, and it also symbolizes the differences between two or more families that end Immediately, reconciliation and harmony come between them. Seeing killing a leper in a dream for a married woman indicates getting rid of enemies and worries that haunt her except envy. Interpretation of a dream about a small leper. Dreaming about killing a small leper in a dream indicates eliminating the problems, worries, and sorrows that the dreamer is exposed to in reality. Interpretation of a leper. The Great in a DreamIf the dreamer sees in a dream that there is a large leprosy in his house, this symbolizes the presence of problems that creep up on him and make him distracted and unfocused. According to Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation. If the dreamer dreams of a large leprosy in the house and leaves it, this symbolizes the collapse of worry, anxiety and problems from the house, as well as getting rid of the turmoil that surrounds him in his life. You can also, dear reader, learn about the interpretation of another dream through Access the instant dream interpretation application. Through this article, we learned about the interpretation of seeing leprosy in a dream about the stomach and its meanings in life.

title: Interpretation of seeing smoking in a dream according to the interpretation of Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing smoking in a dream according to the interpretation of Imam Al-Sadiq, smoking is one of the negative habits that quickly lead to addiction, seeing smoking in a dream is one of the dreams that disturbs the dreamer, especially if he is not a smoker, there are many interpretations related to the dream of smoking, most of these interpretations are negative and not hopeful. And it has meanings that may not satisfy the viewer when he reads them, and these interpretations differ according to the details of the dreamer's dream. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing smoking in a dream according to the interpretation of Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of a dream of seeing smoking in a dream Interpretation of Imam Al-Sadiq The interpretations related to seeing smoking in a dream differ according to whether the person is actually a smoker or not, and we will detail this for you according to what Imam Al-Sadiq mentioned in the following points: Interpretation of a dream of seeing a non-smoker smoking in a dream Whoever was a non-smoker and saw in his dream that he was smoking cigarettes, this indicates that he is protecting himself from harm and conspiring with bad friends. This vision may indicate that he is practicing a bad habit, so this vision came to him to warn him to stay away from anything that could harm his health, and it often indicates the dreamer's attempt to hide his feelings and social problems from it. Around him. And when he sees a group of his acquaintances smoking, this is a sign that they will create problems for him in the coming days. Whoever opposes the idea of ​​smoking and sees himself smoking in a dream, this is a sign that he is doing what he does not like in order to obtain the approval of others. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a smoker smoking in a dream Seeing a smoker smoking indicates his feeling of fear and anxiety and is often a warning to him to quit smoking to preserve his health. Whoever sees himself smoking cigarettes with black smoke, this indicates that he will be exposed to crises and obstacles, but if the smoke is white, this indicates the fulfillment of the dreamer's dreams and aspirations, but it will only last for a while. Whoever sees himself smoking happily, this indicates his feeling of loneliness. Watching smoking in a place where smoking is prohibited is a sign that the viewer will face crises and obstacles in his life that are difficult to solve, which makes him lose hope of getting rid of them. And whoever sees himself smoking with his friends, this is a sign of the strong relationship that connects him. Seeing the purchase of a pack of cigarettes means that the dreamer will enter into a relationship marred by tension and stress. And whoever sees himself smoking, but does not feel the taste of it, and does not see the smoke emanating from it, this is a sign that he no longer pays attention to the feelings of others. Interpretation of a dream about seeing smoking in a dream for a single girl Seeing an unmarried woman smoking in a dream means that she is accompanied by bad friends who are conspiring against her and planning to harm her. Also, seeing smoking with a feeling of happiness is a sign of the presence of bad friends who intend to steal all your money from the single woman. Whoever dreams of smoking sadly is a good vision that indicates her distance from bad friends, and her return to the path of truth and repentance to God Almighty. Seeing a single woman quit smoking in a dream is a sign that she will be far from the bad habits that she is accustomed to Practice it. And whoever sees that someone is forcing her
